name: Pet Feeder
description:
Your pet is starving and needs delicious food now! Collect ingredients outside and follow the recipes posted on the wall to cook as many dishes as you possibly can within 5 minutes! Beware that a wind storm will appear periodically to sweep away the ingredients, so be sure to save the important ones in the fridge!

To play, use the left button of the mouse to drag and cut items.

(There are still major bugs for this iteration, but the idea is there!)
